backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with access-controlled storage for user profiles and timeline configurations, including save and load operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports describing implemented audio-layer, export, and persistence functionalities with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files involved in trailer building, audio handling, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with color and layout settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the main trailer builder page in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, stored identity restoration, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and timeline configurations through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with custom color variables and serif typography for dark-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/TrailerBuilderPlayerP: Main trailer builder page managing segment state, playback, audio sync, recording, and UI layout.
frontend/src/trailer/assets.ts: Maps scene and overlay identifiers to image asset paths.
frontend/src/trailer/audioTracks.ts: Defines available audio tracks for trailers and exports the default track.
Renders a timeline with a scrubber and editable segment durations, highlighting the active segment.
frontend/src/trailer/scriptDefault.ts: Defines the TrailerSegment interface and provides the default ordered trailer script.
frontend/src/trailer/TrailerAudioControl: UI controls for enabling audio, selecting a track, and adjusting volume.
frontend/src/trailer/TrailerRendererCanv: Canvas renderer that preloads assets and draws the current trailer frame with overlays, text, and effects.
frontend/src/trailer/typography.ts: Functions to draw title cards and cinematic captions with fade and layout logic.
frontend/src/trailer/useAudioSettingsPer: Hook that loads and saves audio settings to localStorage.
frontend/src/trailer/useTimelinePersiste: Loads and saves trailer timeline segments to localStorage and exposes them via a React hook.
frontend/src/trailer/useTrailerAudio.ts: Manages an HTMLAudioElement with track selection, volume/enabled settings, sync, and playback control.
frontend/src/trailer/useTrailerExportRec: Captures canvas output (optionally with mixed audio) into a WebM video using MediaRecorder and manages recording state.
Implements trailer playback timing with play, pause, seek, and reset, tracking current time via requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
